plot outline: 1957. The story takes place in a small military town. Colonel Podolsky and his wife are an exemplary family of strict rules. Their 16-year-old daughter Lera, an excellent pupil and the pride of her family, is preparing for the final exams - a gold medal and a prestigious institute is waiting for her. Her parents have already had a posh candidate for a husband. Meantime the family of Lieutenant Colonel Kuznetsov is transferred to the city. His son Yura, an early-grown handsome guy from Moscow, provokes some juicy gossip in the graduation class. Lera looks at the new classmate with condemnation, but not for long - he easily charms her. First love overwhelms the girl with such force that Lera forgets herself. Soon Yura gets tired of playing love, and Lera does not know how to tell her parents that she is pregnant.
title: Dove
